content:
The first draft of the Argonaut Scheduling IG is available for review. It will be the basis for our upcoming Scheduling tract Connecathon and I will be focusing on the Connectathon Orientation and planning on next week's Argonaut Schedulling call:

  • Introduction to Track Lead
  • Track Definition
  • List of participating systems in the track (& contacts?)
  • References to the servers & clients for the track
  • Goals for this track

I would really appreciate review and feedback on the IG:

  • Fact checking and Errors
  • QA for errors, clarifications
  • Layout and Presentation

Questions:

  • Section on Best Practices : Issue #29 for cancellation and best practice guideline is still a work in progress and seeking assistance or references for this.
  • Provider to Provider - is $match only option/can we want to specify or do a basic search as well?
  • Any gross ommissions?

Issues can be logged on Argonaut Scheduling GitHub Issues

( If you are interested in making pull requests let me know )

Please be aware of my Punch list:

Capability statements
Complete examples
Clean up figures and layout to be consistent. (e.g, numbering , extra arrows, etc)

Thanks,

Eric
